characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection with a traffic light. Several vehicles are moving across the intersection, and a cyclist appears from the right side, moving towards the center of the intersection.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is slowing down as it approaches the intersection, likely due to the red traffic light and the presence of crossing vehicles. The vehicle maintains a steady speed to ensure safety and avoid collisions.
key_objects: 1) Front: Multiple vehicles crossing the intersection, approximately 20 meters away, moving from left to right. 2) Right: A cyclist, approximately 15 meters away, moving towards the center of the intersection.

characters: Driver of a white sedan, cyclist, driver of a black car, driver of a yellow taxi
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving through an intersection. Initially, a white sedan is seen crossing the intersection from the left side. A black car then appears from the right side, followed by a cyclist who falls in the middle of the intersection. The scene clears up, and a yellow taxi overtakes the self-driving vehicle from the right side.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while approaching the intersection. It slows down slightly as the cyclist falls in the middle of the intersection, ensuring safety. The vehicle then continues at a steady pace as the intersection clears up.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, crossing the intersection. 2) Right side: A black car, approximately 8 meters away, moving into the intersection. 3) Front: A cyclist, approximately 5 meters away, falling in the middle of the intersection. 4) Right side: A yellow taxi, approximately 2 meters away, overtaking the self-driving vehicle.
